title: Random app crash - from `onAllTokensBuilt` slot (by the log)

milestone.description:
General:
- Memory Usage Improvements (part 3)

General:
- Account Syncing

body:
In the last few days I've noticed this crash few times. Happens very randomly without any special activity in the app, each time I've faced it the app was running in the background and all of a sudden just crashed. This is the log I got:

- First crash:
```
2023-01-11T15:28:30.925+0100	INFO	swarm2	swarm/swarm_dial.go:386	error resolving /dns4/nwaku.d4625381201384ce.dyndns.dappnode.io/tcp/60000/p2p/16Uiu2HAkwCYZ2MYPCt96F6uqyd8cwMwbx6iAr3925fqkxp6r3YZe/p2p-circuit/p2p/16Uiu2HAmL6BcN3XAHTHbaBqQm8N1nHPJUbNLEx6BhXvGWNhHpxBJ: lookup nwaku.d4625381201384ce.dyndns.dappnode.io: no such host
2023-01-11T15:28:39.856+0100	ERROR	autorelay	autorelay/autorelay.go:80	failed to start relay finder	{"error": "relayFinder already running"}
2023-01-11T15:28:41.126+0100	WARN	net/identify	identify/peer_loop.go:93	failed to send Identify Push	{"peer": "16Uiu2HAmCLKeJTxTaQRw9p7Y2xScx7Ax7iwCSUqkXLFYcbWtwmzG", "error": "failed to open push stream: transient connection to peer"}
2023-01-11T15:28:41.126+0100	WARN	net/identify	identify/peer_loop.go:93	failed to send Identify Push	{"peer": "16Uiu2HAmJ485PUFjyB42LCPbC2ofgchN4uTZtREEydhoVD1U9fbH", "error": "failed to open push stream: transient connection to peer"}
2023-01-11T15:28:42.764+0100	INFO	swarm2	swarm/swarm_dial.go:386	error resolving /dns4/nwaku.d4625381201384ce.dyndns.dappnode.io/tcp/60000/p2p/16Uiu2HAkwCYZ2MYPCt96F6uqyd8cwMwbx6iAr3925fqkxp6r3YZe/p2p-circuit/p2p/16Uiu2HAmL6BcN3XAHTHbaBqQm8N1nHPJUbNLEx6BhXvGWNhHpxBJ: lookup nwaku.d4625381201384ce.dyndns.dappnode.io: no such host
DBG 2023-01-11 15:28:46.834+01:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=4319015 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_checkRecentHistoryForChainIDs
DBG 2023-01-11 15:28:46.835+01:00 [threadpool task thread] initiating task   topics="task-threadpool" tid=4319062 file=threadpool.nim:92 messageType=BuildTokensTaskArg:ObjectType threadid=16 task="{\"$type\":\"BuildTokensTaskArg:ObjectType\",\"accounts\":[\"0x76c58e84320e633f3421a2f816fe086a13e353da\",\"0xc63813cf6f1173350a6350745bfd7b2bd4ee8a79\",\"0x1d2a6a3b8eb3b77e7d79aeac660dc65256220019\",\"0x9ec917954eae6937acd782f2f5e976eef3008c32\",\"0x5a48e6d02d4f2a0ce306123ad81d3336e9b52b57\",\"0x42cfdd7330791133189e6777097c1320d96c6eb1\",\"0x2da9ba0c8983cb92d32470bb96bae28f0f3f3a60\"],\"vptr\":105553116930848,\"slot\":\"onAllTokensBuilt\",\"tptr\":4525587872}"
```
